sagex.phoenix.download

Class DownloadManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • sagex.phoenix.download.DownloadManager

  • public class DownloadManager
extends java.lang.Object
    DownloadManager is used to schedule and download remote items. Each download item can specify how many attempts to use before it will give it. The download manager is a better alternative to just manually downloading the url contents, since it can detect errors and then reschedule the download for later.

    • Method Detail

      • download

        public void download(DownloadItem item)
        Schedule a download for immediate download. Downloads are placed in a queue and will be distributed to one of the many download threads that are available.
        Parameters:
        item -

      • getStatus

        public DownloadManager.Status getStatus()
        returns the current status of the download manager. ie, the number of running threads, waiting items, etc.
        Returns:

      • downloadAndWait

        public void downloadAndWait(DownloadItem item)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Downloads the Item and doesn't return util the item is complete. This does not use a background thread, and it doesn not retry if the download fails.
        Parameters:
        item -
        Throws:
        java.net.SocketTimeoutException
        java.io.IOException
